Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

:::Starscream/Battera:::

::Starscream and Battera reach the Blackfortress.  Starscream opens his 
cockpit, Battera climbs out, and Starscream transforms to robot mode::
Battera: So this is your base?
Starscream: Yep.  Our faction's been through a lot.  We used to be a small 
group of Predacons who disliked Megatron's rule.  Lead by Kitkat, we broke 
away, and ended up in several bloody battles with a group of Maximals...
::he dislikes these memories::
Starscream: We met some bot called Destructor and he gave us a better base.  
We eventually made a union of all the predacon factions, but when Kitkat was 
assasinated, everything fell apart, and civil wars began.  Now Kitkat's back, 
we have a huge faction, and things are just plain happier.  Kitkat and 
Drillbit are getting married, im best man.
Battera: Wow.  You have been through a lot.
Starscream: Yep
Battera: it must've been tough for you.  Trust me, i know hard times.
Starscream: We'll talk about that once you join us.
::He liked talking to this girl. he realized he has a slight attraction to 
her.  he keeps reminding himself that he is a warrior, and doesnt have time 
for that, but the feeling is still there.  he opens his comm::
Starscream: Hey Drillbit, im back, and i brought a potential new recruit.

--part1_60.ce424be.27f54aa0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
